answers.answer: If you haven't spoken about it, or had any issues I'm going to assume your going natural. I would talk to them the next time you go just to get a idea of a birth plan and options for yourself :)

It's very simple. If u had a c section b4, the likelihood is that ur having another. Very few doc will let u try naturally after u had 1. If u haven't or its ur 1st then u will try naturally until either u can't push any more n r exhausted n have no strength left or u or baby go into distress. Witch the doc won't know til u r delivering. Or after ur 36 weeks when they check u n if u have ur placenta covering the cervix u will née a c section. If baby is breech n they can't turn him u will need a csection. Or any type of medical emergency u will need a c section like if u have preeclamsia, umbilical is wrapped around the neck or sometimes if u have diabetes. Etc. But this the doc will know once it's closer to due date. If ur not having complications then ur going for natural birth.

question: If you will need a csection or natural? I am 31 weeks as of today I haven't been told anything yet.
title: when does doctor tell you..
